verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, <S%H3117>alway<s%>.

And <S%H3045>know<s%> ye this <S%H3117>day<s%>: for I speak not with your <S%H1121>children<s%> which have not <S%H3045>known<s%>, and which have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, his <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, his <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and his stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>,

And his <S%H226>miracles<s%>, and his <S%H4639>acts<s%>, which he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and unto all his <S%H776>land<s%>;

And what he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, unto their <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and to their <S%H7393>chariots<s%>; how he made the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H6687>overflow<s%> <S%H6440>them<s%> as they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, and how the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6>destroyed<s%> them unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>;
And what he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, until ye <S%H935>came<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%>;

And what he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>: how the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6475>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and swallowed them <S%H1104>up<s%>, and their <S%H1004>households<s%>, and their <S%H168>tents<s%>, and all the <S%H3351>substance<s%> that was in their <S%H7272>possession<s%>, in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: substance: or, living substance which followed them was: Heb. was at their feet
But your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%>.

Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that ye may be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, whither ye <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it;

And that ye may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

For the <S%H776>land<s%>, whither thou goest <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is not as the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from whence ye came <S%H3318>out<s%>, where thou <S%H2232>sowedst<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and <S%H8248>wateredst<s%> it with thy <S%H7272>foot<s%>, as a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs<s%>:

But the <S%H776>land<s%>, whither ye <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2022>hills<s%> and <S%H1237>valleys<s%>, and <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>:

A <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> careth <S%H1875>for<s%>: the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H8548>always<s%> upon it, from the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> even unto the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>. careth: Heb. seeketh

And it shall come to pass, if ye shall <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> unto my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>,

That I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> in his due <S%H6256>season<s%>, the first <S%H3138>rain<s%> and the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H622>gather<s%> in thy <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and thy <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and thine <S%H3323>oil<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in thy <S%H7704>fields<s%> for thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full<s%>. send: Heb. give

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves, that your <S%H3824>heart<s%> be not <S%H6601>deceived<s%>, and ye turn <S%H5493>aside<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them;

And then the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and he shut <S%H6113>up<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, that there be no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, and that the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> not her <S%H2981>fruit<s%>; and lest ye <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from off the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you.

Therefore shall ye lay <S%H7760>up<s%> these my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and in your <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> upon your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that they may be as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them your <S%H1121>children<s%>, <S%H1696>speaking<s%> of them when thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and when thou <S%H3212>walkest<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, when thou <S%H7901>liest<s%> down, and when thou risest <S%H6965>up<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the door <S%H4201>posts<s%> of thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and upon thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

That your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1121>children<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them, as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For if ye shall <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> all these <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him;

Then will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> all these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than yourselves.

Every <S%H4725>place<s%> whereon the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> shall be yours: from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, from the <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, even unto the <S%H314>uttermost<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall your <S%H1366>coast<s%> be.

There shall no <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H4172>dread<s%> of you <S%H6440>upon<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> that ye shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon, as he hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto you.
<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>;
A <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, if ye <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

And a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, if ye will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, but turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, which ye have not <S%H3045>known<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath brought thee <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, that thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%>, and the <S%H7045>curse<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%>.

Are they not on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, <S%H310>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> where the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goeth <S%H3996>down<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6160>champaign<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H436>plains<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%>?

For ye shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you, and ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.
And ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> which I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
